metadata.title: CVE-2016-1762 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The xmlNextChar function in libxml2 before 2.9.4 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted XMLdocument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-1762` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.8
libxml2-utils - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.8
python-libxml2 - 2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml2 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.1+dfsg1-3ubuntu4.8').
